summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the Wav2Vec2BertModel's configuration, initialization, forward behavior, loss computation, and training/inference pathways across multiple architectural variations such as adapters, relative and rotary positional encodings, mixed precision, and masking strategies.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the speech recognition model for production use, enabling confident deployment in applications that depend on accurate audio-to-text conversion and related downstream tasks.
